params.priceRequestIndex: The price request index within the resolvedPriceRequestIds array.
params.totalCorrectVotes: The total amount of correct votes.
params.totalStaked: The total amount of tokens staked.

returns._0: uint256 The amount of tokens to slash per token staked.

params.isGovernance: Whether the request is a governance request.
params.priceRequestIndex: The price request index within the resolvedPriceRequestIds array.
params.totalCorrectVotes: The total amount of correct votes.
params.totalStaked: The total amount of tokens staked.

returns.noVoteSlashPerToken: The amount of tokens to slash for not voting.
returns.wrongVoteSlashPerToken: The amount of tokens to slash for voting wrong.

params.priceRequestIndex: The price request index within the resolvedPriceRequestIds array.
params.totalCorrectVotes: The total amount of correct votes.
params.totalStaked: The total amount of tokens staked.

returns._0: uint256 The amount of tokens to slash per token staked.

params.priceRequestIndex: The price request index within the resolvedPriceRequestIds array.
params.totalCorrectVotes: The total amount of correct votes.
params.totalStaked: The total amount of tokens staked.

returns._0: uint256 The amount of tokens to slash per token staked.

params._baseSlashAmount: Slash amount per token for missed votes and wrong non-governance votes.
params._governanceSlashAmount: Slash amount per token for wrong governance votes.

devdoc.title: Slashing Library contract. Returns the how much a voter should be slashed per staked token as a function of the total staked, total votes and total correct votes. Can be upgraded to a new implementation to enable more elaborate slashing algorithms via UMA governance.

calcNoVoteSlashPerToken(uint256,uint256,.notice: Calculates the no vote slash per token.

calcSlashing(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Calculates all slashing trackers in one go to decrease cross-contract calls needed.

calcWrongVoteSlashPerToken(uint256,uint2.notice: Calculates the wrong vote slash per token.

calcWrongVoteSlashPerTokenGovernance(uin.notice: Calculates the wrong vote slash per token for governance requests.
